text: Qizhong you xuduo mingxian de jixiang, ru yi bu la xin de zhanli chu [chaojin huan you tian fang hou ke zai ci li liang bai]. Shei jinru qizhong, shei bian huo ping'an. Fan you nengli daoda tian fang zhe, ren ren dou you wei an la chaojin tian fang de yiwu [zhu]. Shei bu xinyang, name, an la que shi wu qiu yu zhong shijie de.
